title: Blood Moon skins Unavailable?
body:
Hey, I was planning on buying Blood Moon Elise today, and possibly the Thresh one as well, but they're listed as unavailable? Are they legacy skins or have they been disabled because of bugs/maintenance or what? 

Thanks~
(PS, Have a Merry Christmas!)

replies.body: Ohh, thanks. Do you know when they will be? Next patch?

> [{quoted}](name=Vieyl,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=BgTxb5yd,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2014-12-25T00:24:03.880+0000)
>
> Ohh, thanks. Do you know when they will be? Next patch?

They'll be available a bit later this patch. :]
My bet would be new year eve or new year day

Nope. Still waiting for them myself. They are to be released during the current patch (4.21) though from what I got out of support.  I'd say sometime after Christmas with the way things have gone so far.

Just assume that they won't be released until Snowdown is done. I think that ends on the 6th of January. Thats about when I assume they will release them. 

Honestly its really annoying to play thresh and just have that skin taunt me. I wish they would take it down until they are ready to actually let it e bought. I get a couple days, but this has been a week and will continue for a while longer.

> [{quoted}](name=Onegarion,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=BgTxb5yd,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2014-12-27T20:25:43.124+0000)
>
> Just assume that they won't be released until Snowdown is done. I think that ends on the 6th of January. Thats about when I assume they will release them. 
> 
> Honestly its really annoying to play thresh and just have that skin taunt me. I wish they would take it down until they are ready to actually let it e bought. I get a couple days, but this has been a week and will continue for a while longer.

This is exactly what I was trying to say. Everytime I play Elise which is 7/10 games most days, I have to see it there, so alluring.
The 4.21 patch notes said "The following skins will be released at various times during Patch 4.21" and listed them and several others that have been released, hopefully that translates to soon.

It hurts to have it there...looking down at me....luring me...I can't take it anymore Rito.plz give us an approx. date or something.I must have BM Elise at all cost and throwing my money at the screen hasn't been working!{{item:3073}} {{champion:32}}

hey KateyKhaos would you mind playing a game with me becase im almost at my 1000 win currenty at 978 

Thanks again for reading this -Bombingben{{item:1043}}
For the love of god I need Elise asap! Bought rp about two weeks ago then dodged a queue when I noticed it was suddenly showing up on champ select although unavailable. 8/10 troll rito.
I have been waiting too. :/ You are not alone.
